:[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amountDscToMint","type":"uint256"}],"name":"mintDsc","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"collateralToken","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"collateralAmount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"redeemCollateral","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"collateralToken","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"collateralAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amountDscToBurn","type":"uint256"}],"name":"redeemCollateralForDsc","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"0xNascosta     The system is designed to be as minimial as possible and have the tokens maintain a 1 token == $1 peg.     This stable coin has the properties:     - Exogenous Collateral     - Dollar Pegged     - Algorithmically Stable     It is similar to DAI if DAI had no governance, no fees and was only backed by WETH and WBTC.     Out DSC system should always be \"over-collateralized\". At no point, should the value of all collateral <= the $ backed value of all DSC.","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"DSCEngine","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"burnDsc(uint256)":{"notice":"Removes Debt"},"getUsdValue(address,uint256)":{"notice":"This function will not return the correct USD value for tokens that do not have 18 decimals and a price feed of 8 decimals."},"redeemCollateral(address,uint256)":{"notice":"In order to redeem collateral: - 1. Health Factor must be over 1 AFTER collateral has been withdrawn."}},"notice":"This contract is the core of the DSC System. It handles all the logic for mining and redeeming DSC, as well as depositing & withdrawing collateral.This contract is VERY loosely based on the MakerDAO DSS (DAI) documentation.text:
In order to redeem collateral:
 - 1. Health Factor must be over 1 AFTER collateral has been withdrawn.
@notice This function will not return the correct USD value for tokens that do not have 18 decimals and a price feed of 8 decimals.
